name: Chimeric Phantom
description: The Chimeric Phantom is a ghostly figure that hovers above the ground, instilling fear and confusion with its eerie presence.
memorable: It can inflict fear on nearby enemies while maneuvering easily through objects.
goals: To instill fear and chaos among its foes.
relations: Could be related to or conjured by necromancers or spirits.
environment: Often found in haunted locations or abandoned places.
strengths: Resistance to many damage types and immunity to several conditions.
weaknesses: Average strength and constitution, making it physically less robust.
attacks: Utilizes Maddening Grasp to deal necrotic damage, targeting living foes.
most_powerful_ability: Frightening Madness, which can incapacitate nearby enemies with fear.
additional_information: Immunity to poison and many conditions
Can communicate in languages known by its constituent souls
Average ability scores with a strong Wisdom
Ability to pass through objects for tactical advantage
Has a specific fear-inducing aura affecting foes nearby
test_queries: ghostly creature that passes through walls
mobile undead that uses necrotic damage
